rules: Rule1: Provided that the industrial plant is fined, then the environmental agency is reported.
Rule2: In the event that the Clean Air Act is passed, the carbon tax is enacted.
Rule3: Under the condition that the climate bill is signed, the Paris Agreement is ratified.
Rule4: Assuming the environmental group lobbied, then if the Paris Agreement is ratified, the Clean Air Act is passed.
Rule5: Whenever community activists protest, then if the Paris Agreement is ratified, the Clean Air Act is passed.
Rule6: If ocean currents are studied, then the polar bear is tracked.
Rule7: Provided that a severe storm is predicted, the coastal town is evacuated.
Rule8: Either a severe storm is predicted or ocean currents are not studied.
Rule9: In the event that the ecosystem manager is employed, the conservation officer is hired.
Rule10: The driving of the electric bus implies that the carbon tax is enacted.
Rule11: Either the electric bus is driven or the solar ferry is operated.
Rule12: Whenever public transit is invested in, the electric fleet is purchased.
Rule13: Either public transit is invested in or bicycle sharing is subsidized.
Rule14: In the event that bicycle sharing is subsidized, then if the solar ferry is operated, the carbon tax is enacted.
Rule15: The approval of the conservation grant implies that the beach cleanup is not funded.
Rule16: Assuming pedestrian zones are expanded, then carbon emissions are reduced.
Rule17: If the electric fleet is purchased, then pedestrian zones are expanded.
Rule18: Whenever the nature reserve is designated, oil drilling is not permitted.
Rule19: If endangered species are surveyed, then biodiversity is catalogued.
Rule20: The cataloguing of biodiversity implies that the nature reserve is designated.
Rule21: In the event that the Green Party is elected, the environmental group lobbied.
Rule22: Provided that the environment minister is appointed, community activists protested.
Rule23: If the wildlife corridor is enacted, then the conservation grant is approved.
Rule24: Assuming the science community advocated, then if the Paris Agreement is ratified, the Clean Air Act is passed.
Rule25: Whenever a public petition is demanded, then if the Paris Agreement is ratified, the Clean Air Act is passed.
Rule26: If the research paper is published, then the science community advocated.
Rule27: Either the research paper is published or the online petition is circulated.
Rule28: Under the condition that the online petition is circulated, a public petition is demanded.
Rule29: If the Clean Air Act is repealed, then it is not the case that industrial quotas are increased.
Rule30: Provided that the recycling program is implemented, then if the Clean Air Act is repealed, industrial quotas are increased.
Rule31: Whenever municipal funds are allocated, the recycling program is implemented.
Rule32: Either municipal funds are allocated or local residents volunteered.
Rule33: Assuming curbside collection is mandated, then if local residents volunteered, the recycling program is implemented.
Rule34: In the event that the zero-waste policy is adopted, then if the solar ferry is operated, the carbon tax is enacted.
Rule35: The construction of the waste-to-energy plant implies that the landfill is not built.
Rule36: If the sensor network is deployed, then a pollution spike is detected.
Rule37: Whenever the emergency protocol is activated, then either a public alert is issued or if the sensor network is deployed, it is not the case that a pollution spike is detected.
Rule38: Either the emergency protocol is activated or water quality is monitored.
Rule39: If it is not the case that either plastic bags are banned or the carbon tax is enacted, then the beach cleanup is funded.
Rule40: Provided that it is not the case that either plastic bags are banned or the carbon tax is enacted, the wildlife corridor is enacted.

Rule41: Assuming it is not the case that if water quality is monitored, then either a public alert is issued or if the sensor network is deployed, it is not the case that a pollution spike is detected, the industrial plant is fined.
Rule42: If it is not the case that either the environmental group lobbied or community activists protested, then ocean currents are studied.
Rule43: Whenever it is not the case that either the tidal barrier is installed or if the carbon tax is not enacted, then sea level rise is measured, the ecosystem manager is employed.

Rule44: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the tidal barrier is installed or if the carbon tax is not enacted, then sea level rise is measured, it is not the case that the conservation officer is hired.
Rule45: If it is not the case that if the polar bear is tracked, then the Arctic habitat is protected, oil drilling is permitted.
Rule46: Assuming it is not the case that if the polar bear is tracked, then the Arctic habitat is protected, endangered species are surveyed.
Rule47: If it is not the case that either the Green Party is elected or the environment minister is appointed, the emissions cap is repealed.
Rule48: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the carbon tax is not enacted, then migratory birds are observed, the sensor network is deployed.
Rule49: Whenever the Clean Air Act is not passed, then the Clean Air Act is repealed.
Rule50: In the event that the zero-waste policy is not adopted, the landfill is built.
Rule51: If the zero-waste policy is not adopted, then the waste-to-energy plant is constructed.
Rule52: Under the condition that the carbon tax is not enacted, it is not the case that migratory birds are observed.
facts: Fact1: The climate bill is signed.
Fact3: It is not the case that plastic bags are banned.
Fact4: It is not the case that the environmental agency is reported.
Fact5: It is not the case that the coastal town is evacuated.
Fact6: It is not the case that sea level rise is measured.
Fact7: It is not the case that the tidal barrier is installed.
Fact8: It is not the case that carbon emissions are reduced.
Fact9: It is not the case that the Arctic habitat is protected.
Fact10: It is not the case that the emissions cap is repealed.
Fact11: It is not the case that a public alert is issued.
